ModMetaData.name: Misc. Incidents
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** This needs Miscellaneous CORE to work without errors! ***
-Artefact Your colonist stumbles over an ancient artifact. What might happen if you activate it? -Tactical Computer + Computer Terminal + Anomaly The tactical computer and it's incident: the nearby anomaly -Rumor of ... Your visitors tell you about some rumors of ... If you wish you can send a few colonists to take a look. What will they find?
Special thanks to mrofa for the graphics. (Version: 0.13.1)
